line.originaltext: 2 pounds Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and thinly sliced
line.annotation: create_ing(ing12, "2 pounds Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and thinly sliced")

line.originaltext: 3/4 cup cranberries
1/4 cup white sugar
3 teaspoons ground cinnamon
1 teaspoon ground nutmeg
1/3 cup quick-cooking oats
1/3 cup all-purpose flour
1/2 cup packed light brown sugar
line.annotation: create_ing(ing19, "1/2 cup packed light brown sugar")

line.originaltext: 1/4 cup butter, cut into pieces
line.annotation: create_ing(ing20, "1/4 cup butter, cut into pieces")

line.originaltext: 1/2 cup chopped pecans
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C.) Butter an 8 inch square baking dish.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C.) Butter an 8 inch square baking dish.
line.annotation: set(t2,"Preheat to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C.)")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C.) Butter an 8 inch square baking dish.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C.) Butter an 8 inch square baking dish.
In a large bowl, mix together apples, cranberries, white sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg.
In a large bowl, mix together apples, cranberries, white sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing13, ing14, ing15, ing16}, ing22, "apple mixture", "")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, mix together apples, cranberries, white sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg.
line.annotation: mix(ing22, t4, ing23, "mixed apple stuff", "mix together")

line.originaltext: Place evenly into baking dish.
In the same bowl, combine oats, flour and brown sugar.
line.annotation: combine({ing17, ing18, ing19}, ing24, "oat mixture", "in the same bowl")

line.originaltext: With a fork, mix in butter until crumbly.
line.annotation: combine({ing20, ing24}, ing25, "buttered oats", "with a fork, mix in butter until crumbly")

line.originaltext: Stir in pecans. Sprinkle over apples.
Stir in pecans. Sprinkle over apples.
line.annotation: combine({ing23, ing26}, ing27, "uncooked crisp", "sprinkle topping over mixed apple stuff")

line.originaltext: Bake in preheated oven for 40 to 50 minutes, or until topping is golden brown, and apples are tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing27, t2, ing28, "finished crisp", "Bake for 40 to 50 minutes or until toppong is golden brown, and apples are tender")

line.originaltext: Bake in preheated oven for 40 to 50 minutes, or until topping is golden brown, and apples are tender.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing28,"topping is golden brown and apples are tender")
